title: TestBedStatic
contents:
API > @angular/core > @angular/core/testing
mode_edit code

TestBedStaticlink

TestBedViewEngine 和 TestBedRender3 實現的靜態方法

Static methods implemented by the TestBedViewEngine and TestBedRender3

interface TestBedStatic { new (...args: any[]): TestBed initTestEnvironment(ngModule: Type<any> | Type<any>[], platform: PlatformRef, aotSummaries?: () => any[]): TestBed resetTestEnvironment(): void resetTestingModule(): TestBedStatic configureCompiler(config: { providers?: any[]; useJit?: boolean; }): TestBedStatic configureTestingModule(moduleDef: TestModuleMetadata): TestBedStatic compileComponents(): Promise<any> overrideModule(ngModule: Type<any>, override: MetadataOverride<NgModule>): TestBedStatic overrideComponent(component: Type<any>, override: MetadataOverride<Component>): TestBedStatic overrideDirective(directive: Type<any>, override: MetadataOverride<Directive>): TestBedStatic overridePipe(pipe: Type<any>, override: MetadataOverride<Pipe>): TestBedStatic overrideTemplate(component: Type<any>, template: string): TestBedStatic overrideTemplateUsingTestingModule(component: Type<any>, template: string): TestBedStatic overrideProvider(token: any, provider: { useFactory: Function; deps: any[]; }): TestBedStatic inject<T>(token: ProviderToken<T>, notFoundValue?: T, flags?: InjectFlags): T get<T>(token: ProviderToken<T>, notFoundValue?: T, flags?: InjectFlags): any createComponent<T>(component: Type<T>): ComponentFixture<T> }

mode_edit code

Allows overriding default compiler providers and settings which are defined in test_injector.js

configureTestingModule() link

mode_edit code

允許覆蓋測試注入器的預設提供者、指令、管道、模組，它們在 test_injector.js 中定義

Allows overriding default providers, directives, pipes, modules of the test injector, which are defined in test_injector.js

引數
moduleDef TestModuleMetadata

TestBedStatic

compileComponents() link

mode_edit code

使用測試用的 NgModule templateUrl 編譯元件。由於提取網址是非同步的，因此必須呼叫此函式。

Compile components with a templateUrl for the test's NgModule. It is necessary to call this function as fetching urls is asynchronous.
compileComponents(): Promise<any>
引數

沒有引數。

返回值

Promise<any>

overrideTemplateUsingTestingModule() link

mode_edit code

覆蓋給定元件的範本，在 TestingModule 的上下文中編譯該範本。

Overrides the template of the given component, compiling the template in the context of the TestingModule.
overrideTemplateUsingTestingModule(component: Type<any>, template: string): TestBedStatic
引數
component Type
template string
返回值

TestBedStatic

注意：這也適用於 JIT 和 AOT 的元件。

Note: This works for JIT and AOTed components as well.
